casebody.data:
In the Matter of B.N.H. A Minor Child.
appealed by Respondent-Mother Leigh Ann H. No. 279P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Gary C. Rhodes, Salisbury, for Mother-Leigh Ann H. J. David Abernathy, for Catawba County Dept. of SS. Angela Phillips, Guardian Ad Litem, Pro Se. Carolyn Crouch, Mary McKay, Attorney Advocates, for Other. Donald Posey, Hickory, for Father.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th day of May 2005 by Respondent (Mother-Leigh Ann H.) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th day of June 2005."
